title: SnowBikeMike played Elden Ring Nightreign at 3AM - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.14.25
description:
This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10%
off your first month.

Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code FUNNY to get 35% off polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://rocketmoney.com/kindafunny to cancel your unwanted subscriptions with Rocket Money.

Elden Ring Nightreign’s first playtest has happened, The big winners from the DICE Awards, and some new details on Okami 2.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
GAMESCAST - What we’ve been playing
Game Showdown is after that.
The STREAM is Bless plays Dark Souls for the first time
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:Delaney Twining, Karl Jacobs, OmegaBuster, & Karin Lindner

00:00:00 - Start
00:07:50 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:11:20 - Elden Ring Nightreign’s First Network Test Plagued by Server Issues, FromSoftware Issues Apology - Wesley Yin-Poole @ IGN
00:23:55 - Elden Ring Nightreign Will Get DLC Bosses and Characters, According to Steam Page Slip-up - Eric Van Allen @ IGN
00:31:58 - Ad  
00:34:12 - DICE Awards Winners! - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:41:45 - Ōkami 2 Confirmed to Be a Direct Sequel, Still in Early Development - Rebekah Valentine @ IGN
00:46:05 - Ubisoft CEO says the plan is to focus on open-world and live service games ‘year after year’ - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:52:35 - Two big Final Fantasy remakes are reportedly still in ‘active development’ - Jordan Middler @ VGC
00:56:00 - Wee News!
01:00:00 - SuperChats
01:01:30 - You‘re Wrong
